synopsis.text:
This captivating anime unfolds in a dystopian future where Earth has been ravaged by a catastrophic meteor strike, leaving the world under the iron grip of the technologically superior Trader Forces. Amidst the turmoil, a young orphan named Tetsurou Daiba finds himself entangled in a cosmic conflict, as he discovers latent abilities that allow him to pilot advanced spacecraft with ease.

Together with an enigmatic girl named Rei Yuuki, who shares similar powers, they embark on a mission to overthrow the oppressive regime. As the last known survivors of the meteor impact, they hold the key to humanity's salvation. Aided by a mysterious woman named Mello and a telepathic cat, Tetsurou and Rei must navigate a complex web of alliances and betrayals, ultimately deciding whether to remain on their war-torn planet or venture into the vast unknown of space. Prepare for an exhilarating journey filled with action, suspense, and the indomitable spirit of two unlikely heroes fighting to restore freedom to their world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
